title: Ridiculous Amount of Lag
body: I have been recieving ridiculous lag spikes ever since the servers moved to Chicago. This is starting to become annoying and I am sure some of the other players on the west coast are feeling the same. Can Riot make a fix for this? I know the problem is not on my side because many of my other friends are also experiencing the same issue. Please help

replies.body:
Hey PeanutHeadxX, 

As someone who lives on the west coast I can sympathize with you. i was having the same issue and reach out to Riot for some help and they showed me their connection KB. Why not give it a try and see if it works for you too :) 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I'll be on for a bit so even if it doesn't help reach out so I can try and help you fix it up. :D
